The material-point method¶

This is a parallel implementation of written in C++ with OpenMP using a Python front end of the material-point method as originally designed by [sulsky_1994], [sulsky_1995]. Particles are represented with NumPy arrays and are integrated with a finite-element grid and basis functions provided by FEniCS.
